description:
Device Bondage presents it’s first Fantasy Feature starring newcomer Sheena Rose.

Sheena is a new model, and upon looking for work, she stumbles across a fetish site that is need of fresh meat. She applies, and instantly gets a call back. One of their directors had a cancellation, and needs a model to fill in for the day. She jumps at the opportunity to work, and rushes out the door to the studio.

She arrives and is prepped for the shoot, but as her day goes on, she starts to become anxious about shooting. She keeps getting odd looks about her choice to shoot such a hardcore site without even looking at the site, but decides to trust in the fact that they are a reputable company, and she should be safe.

The time comes to meet the crew and she shows some enthusiasm, only to find out that she still hasn’t met the director that she is working for, and heard about. Again she finds herself becoming nervous, but pushes on because she wants to have this experience. She agrees to go ahead with the shoot, and her day officially begins. She signed up for the experience, but what happens next may not be quite what she thought she was going to happen.
title: Blind Fear A Device Bondage Feature
